dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I figured why not play into the role of damsel? It could be fun after all.

dialogue.name: Prince
dialogue.dialogueText: Of course I would save you any day.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: He puts on a gorgeous smile that almost makes me swoon. Wow he has really pretty eyes huh?

dialogue.name: Prince
dialogue.dialogueText: Anyway please tell me your name young sir!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: He seems quite eager to talk to me. It kind of makes me sad to be honest because it reminds me that no girls have given me this type of reaction since coming here...

dialogue.name: Prince
dialogue.dialogueText: Ah Takeshi-kun? What a heroic name! Perhaps I was right about you!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: What does he mean right about me?
